A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not your grandfather's Star Wars. There's a lot of Disney\, there are more jokes than before\, but its still Star Wars. Its Star Wars for the next 40 years\, not the last 40 years. There are reveals and there are more questions. It was fantastic and spectacular. If the opening scroll always gives you goosebumps when the horns start blowing\, you're going to love it. This is the new Star Wars!
